resources.string: By continuing, you agree to our\nEULA and Privacy Policy.
We’ll use community data to calculate a health score for your current location.
We’ll send you actionable, science-based updates from local institutions.
Based on your current location, environmental factors, and the latest COVID-19 outbreak data, you shouldwork from home today if possible.
We’ll help you and your community better manage resources.
Safely deliver food to others in your area.
Autonomy can help you most if you turn on the following:
We’ll use your location data to give you the latest COVID-19 outbreak information for your local current area and tell how to help your local community.
Are you at higher risk for severe illness from COVID-19?

Higher risk individuals currently include:
• People over age 65 And anyone with any of the following pre-existing medical conditions:
• High blood pressure (hypertension)
• Cardiovascular disease
• Diabetes
• Chronic respiratory disease (such as lung disease or asthma)
• Cancer
No, I’m not at higher risk
Unexpected error has occurred. Please contact support team
The Autonomy app on your device is out of date. Please update Spring to continue using it.
Please check your connection and try again.
Could not register account. Please try again later.
Let us if you are currently experiencing any of common COVID-19 symptoms.
Let people in your local community know that you need help
Do you have any of the following symptoms?
What kind of assistance do you need?
I need help getting food and water.
I need help getting essential medications.
I need help traveling to get medical care.
I need help traveling to a safe location.
Enter description of desired items or destination here
Where is a safe place to meet your helper?
Enter a physical address other safe location description here
How should your helper contact you?
Enter contact info here. For example, a Line ID, WhatsApp ID, or phone number.
Please review your request for assistance:
Your request for assistance has been broadcast to your LOCAL community
You will receive a notification when someone has volunteered to help.
Need access to food or water
Need transport from an unsafe home
Could not broadcast your request. Please try again later.
You are currently signed up to fulfill this community request. If you are unable to complete it, please contact the community member to let them know.
Could not sign up request. Please try again later.
Thank you for signing up to fulfill this community request
The community member in need has been notified of your response. Please write down or take a screenshot of the request details now then contact the community member.
Could not report your symptoms. Please try again later.

Autonomy requires access to your location to use the app. We will only use this data in calculating statistics for a general location and will never reveal any personally identifiable information about you.
Someone has signed up to fulfill your community request. Please wait for time to contact you.
Someone has already signed up to fulfill this community request.
How are you right now? Tap to check in.
Sorry, but you already have an outstanding help request to your community. Currently, our system only supports one request at a time for each community member.
Thanks so much for your eagerness to help out, but another community member just signed up for this request.
